{##}

    \midrule
    \multicolumn{{ brace(ncols) }}{r}{{ "{{" }}\small Continued on next page\normalsize{{ "}}" }} \\
    \midrule
    \endfoot

    {% if footer %}\midrule
    {{ footer }}\\{% endif %}

    \bottomrule
    \endlastfoot

    \caption{{ brace(caption) }}\label{{ "{table:" }}{{ label }}{{ "}" }}\\
    \toprule
   {% if header_row %}{{ header_row }}
    \midrule{% endif %}
    \endfirsthead

    \caption[]{{ brace(caption) }}\\
    \toprule
    {% if header_row %}{{ header_row }}
    \midrule{% endif %}
    \endhead

{{ table_body }}

\end{longtable}
\end{spacing}
